div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: Safety Reminder: Due to the COVID-19 Virus...The Lac du Flambeau Public School Playground (and basketball/tennis courts etc...) are closed until further notice. Thank you.

div.h3: Lac du Flambeau School , 22 days ago
div.p: Important information about Food Distribution: No Food Distribution on Friday, April 10th or Mon. April 13th. (Easter) However, there will be DOUBLE food distribution on Thursday, April 9th. Don't miss it! 9-11:00. The regular meal distribution will continue on Tues,April 14th.
